title: IELTS Speaking Answers - Episode 24 - Famous People

json.text: Hi there! I'm Mark from MarkTeacher.com and this is another high band IELTS
example answer. This IELTS speaking question is about famous people. Have you
ever met any pop stars or celebrities face to face? I haven't met any pop stars
face to face, but I've bumped into a few other celebrities. I've met a few
American actors while I was traveling through the USA and because I'm a big
motorsport fan I've met a couple of racing drivers as well and I've even
gotten some autographs from them too. I don't really enjoy going to pop concerts
so I'd only bump into a pop star or a singer if I went there - if I went to more
gigs and I don't really do it, so it would just have to be a complete
accident if I met someone like that. If you want more check out MarkTeacher.com for more IELTS courses lessons and tips!
